packages/file_input/packages/file_input_view/include/plugins/swfupload.speed.js

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002       Speed Plug-in
00003       
00004       Features:
00005             *Adds several properties to the 'file' object indicated upload speed, time left, upload time, etc.
00006                   - currentSpeed -- String indicating the upload speed, bytes per second
00007                   - averageSpeed -- Overall average upload speed, bytes per second
00008                   - movingAverageSpeed -- Speed over averaged over the last several measurements, bytes per second
00009                   - timeRemaining -- Estimated remaining upload time in seconds
00010                   - timeElapsed -- Number of seconds passed for this upload
00011                   - percentUploaded -- Percentage of the file uploaded (0 to 100)
00012                   - sizeUploaded -- Formatted size uploaded so far, bytes
00013             
00014             *Adds setting 'moving_average_history_size' for defining the window size used to calculate the moving average speed.
00015             
00016             *Adds several Formatting functions for formatting that values provided on the file object.
00017                   - SWFUpload.speed.formatBPS(bps) -- outputs string formatted in the best units (Gbps, Mbps, Kbps, bps)
00018                   - SWFUpload.speed.formatTime(seconds) -- outputs string formatted in the best units (x Hr y M z S)
00019                   - SWFUpload.speed.formatSize(bytes) -- outputs string formatted in the best units (w GB x MB y KB z B )
00020                   - SWFUpload.speed.formatPercent(percent) -- outputs string formatted with a percent sign (x.xx %)
00021                   - SWFUpload.speed.formatUnits(baseNumber, divisionArray, unitLabelArray, fractionalBoolean)
00022                         - Formats a number using the division array to determine how to apply the labels in the Label Array
00023                         - factionalBoolean indicates whether the number should be returned as a single fractional number with a unit (speed)
00024                             or as several numbers labeled with units (time)
00025       */
00026 
00027 var SWFUpload;
00028 if (typeof(SWFUpload) === "function") {
00029       SWFUpload.speed = {};
00030       
00031       SWFUpload.prototype.initSettings = (function (oldInitSettings) {
00032             return function () {
00033                   if (typeof(oldInitSettings) === "function") {
00034                         oldInitSettings.call(this);
00035                   }
00036                   
00037                   this.ensureDefault = function (settingName, defaultValue) {
00038                         this.settings[settingName] = (this.settings[settingName] == undefined) ? defaultValue : this.settings[settingName];
00039                   };
00040 
00041                   // List used to keep the speed stats for the files we are tracking
00042                   this.fileSpeedStats = {};
00043                   this.speedSettings = {};
00044 
00045                   this.ensureDefault("moving_average_history_size", "10");
00046                   
00047                   this.speedSettings.user_file_queued_handler = this.settings.file_queued_handler;
00048                   this.speedSettings.user_file_queue_error_handler = this.settings.file_queue_error_handler;
00049                   this.speedSettings.user_upload_start_handler = this.settings.upload_start_handler;
00050                   this.speedSettings.user_upload_error_handler = this.settings.upload_error_handler;
00051                   this.speedSettings.user_upload_progress_handler = this.settings.upload_progress_handler;
00052                   this.speedSettings.user_upload_success_handler = this.settings.upload_success_handler;
00053                   this.speedSettings.user_upload_complete_handler = this.settings.upload_complete_handler;
00054                   
00055                   this.settings.file_queued_handler = SWFUpload.speed.fileQueuedHandler;
00056                   this.settings.file_queue_error_handler = SWFUpload.speed.fileQueueErrorHandler;
00057                   this.settings.upload_start_handler = SWFUpload.speed.uploadStartHandler;
00058                   this.settings.upload_error_handler = SWFUpload.speed.uploadErrorHandler;
00059                   this.settings.upload_progress_handler = SWFUpload.speed.uploadProgressHandler;
00060                   this.settings.upload_success_handler = SWFUpload.speed.uploadSuccessHandler;
00061                   this.settings.upload_complete_handler = SWFUpload.speed.uploadCompleteHandler;
00062                   
00063                   delete this.ensureDefault;
00064             };
00065       })(SWFUpload.prototype.initSettings);

00068       SWFUpload.speed.fileQueuedHandler = function (file) {
00069             if (typeof this.speedSettings.user_file_queued_handler === "function") {
00070                   file = SWFUpload.speed.extendFile(file);
00071                   
00072                   return this.speedSettings.user_file_queued_handler.call(this, file);
00073             }
00074       };
00075       
00076       SWFUpload.speed.fileQueueErrorHandler = function (file, errorCode, message) {
00077             if (typeof this.speedSettings.user_file_queue_error_handler === "function") {
00078                   file = SWFUpload.speed.extendFile(file);
00079                   
00080                   return this.speedSettings.user_file_queue_error_handler.call(this, file, errorCode, message);
00081             }
00082       };
00083 
00084       SWFUpload.speed.uploadStartHandler = function (file) {
00085             if (typeof this.speedSettings.user_upload_start_handler === "function") {
00086                   file = SWFUpload.speed.extendFile(file, this.fileSpeedStats);
00087                   return this.speedSettings.user_upload_start_handler.call(this, file);
00088             }
00089       };
00090       
00091       SWFUpload.speed.uploadErrorHandler = function (file, errorCode, message) {
00092             file = SWFUpload.speed.extendFile(file, this.fileSpeedStats);
00093             SWFUpload.speed.removeTracking(file, this.fileSpeedStats);
00094 
00095             if (typeof this.speedSettings.user_upload_error_handler === "function") {
00096                   return this.speedSettings.user_upload_error_handler.call(this, file, errorCode, message);
00097             }
00098       };
00099       SWFUpload.speed.uploadProgressHandler = function (file, bytesComplete, bytesTotal) {
00100             this.updateTracking(file, bytesComplete);
00101             file = SWFUpload.speed.extendFile(file, this.fileSpeedStats);
00102 
00103             if (typeof this.speedSettings.user_upload_progress_handler === "function") {
00104                   return this.speedSettings.user_upload_progress_handler.call(this, file, bytesComplete, bytesTotal);
00105             }
00106       };
00107       
00108       SWFUpload.speed.uploadSuccessHandler = function (file, serverData) {
00109             if (typeof this.speedSettings.user_upload_success_handler === "function") {
00110                   file = SWFUpload.speed.extendFile(file, this.fileSpeedStats);
00111                   return this.speedSettings.user_upload_success_handler.call(this, file, serverData);
00112             }
00113       };
00114       SWFUpload.speed.uploadCompleteHandler = function (file) {
00115             file = SWFUpload.speed.extendFile(file, this.fileSpeedStats);
00116             SWFUpload.speed.removeTracking(file, this.fileSpeedStats);
00117 
00118             if (typeof this.speedSettings.user_upload_complete_handler === "function") {
00119                   return this.speedSettings.user_upload_complete_handler.call(this, file);
00120             }
00121       };

00123       // Private: extends the file object with the speed plugin values
00124       SWFUpload.speed.extendFile = function (file, trackingList) {
00125             var tracking;
00126             
00127             if (trackingList) {
00128                   tracking = trackingList[file.id];
00129             }
00130             
00131             if (tracking) {
00132                   file.currentSpeed = tracking.currentSpeed;
00133                   file.averageSpeed = tracking.averageSpeed;
00134                   file.movingAverageSpeed = tracking.movingAverageSpeed;
00135                   file.timeRemaining = tracking.timeRemaining;
00136                   file.timeElapsed = tracking.timeElapsed;
00137                   file.percentUploaded = tracking.percentUploaded;
00138                   file.sizeUploaded = tracking.bytesUploaded;
00139 
00140             } else {
00141                   file.currentSpeed = 0;
00142                   file.averageSpeed = 0;
00143                   file.movingAverageSpeed = 0;
00144                   file.timeRemaining = 0;
00145                   file.timeElapsed = 0;
00146                   file.percentUploaded = 0;
00147                   file.sizeUploaded = 0;
00148             }
00149             
00150             return file;
00151       };
00152       
00153       // Private: Updates the speed tracking object, or creates it if necessary
00154       SWFUpload.prototype.updateTracking = function (file, bytesUploaded) {
00155             var tracking = this.fileSpeedStats[file.id];
00156             if (!tracking) {
00157                   this.fileSpeedStats[file.id] = tracking = {};
00158             }
00159             
00160             // Sanity check inputs
00161             bytesUploaded = bytesUploaded || tracking.bytesUploaded || 0;
00162             if (bytesUploaded < 0) {
00163                   bytesUploaded = 0;
00164             }
00165             if (bytesUploaded > file.size) {
00166                   bytesUploaded = file.size;
00167             }
00168             
00169             var tickTime = (new Date()).getTime();
00170             if (!tracking.startTime) {
00171                   tracking.startTime = (new Date()).getTime();
00172                   tracking.lastTime = tracking.startTime;
00173                   tracking.currentSpeed = 0;
00174                   tracking.averageSpeed = 0;
00175                   tracking.movingAverageSpeed = 0;
00176                   tracking.movingAverageHistory = [];
00177                   tracking.timeRemaining = 0;
00178                   tracking.timeElapsed = 0;
00179                   tracking.percentUploaded = bytesUploaded / file.size;
00180                   tracking.bytesUploaded = bytesUploaded;
00181             } else if (tracking.startTime > tickTime) {
00182                   this.debug("When backwards in time");
00183             } else {
00184                   // Get time and deltas
00185                   var now = (new Date()).getTime();
00186                   var lastTime = tracking.lastTime;
00187                   var deltaTime = now - lastTime;
00188                   var deltaBytes = bytesUploaded - tracking.bytesUploaded;
00189                   
00190                   if (deltaBytes === 0 || deltaTime === 0) {
00191                         return tracking;
00192                   }
00193                   
00194                   // Update tracking object
00195                   tracking.lastTime = now;
00196                   tracking.bytesUploaded = bytesUploaded;
00197                   
00198                   // Calculate speeds
00199                   tracking.currentSpeed = (deltaBytes * 8 ) / (deltaTime / 1000);
00200                   tracking.averageSpeed = (tracking.bytesUploaded * 8) / ((now - tracking.startTime) / 1000);
00201 
00202                   // Calculate moving average
00203                   tracking.movingAverageHistory.push(tracking.currentSpeed);
00204                   if (tracking.movingAverageHistory.length > this.settings.moving_average_history_size) {
00205                         tracking.movingAverageHistory.shift();
00206                   }
00207                   
00208                   tracking.movingAverageSpeed = SWFUpload.speed.calculateMovingAverage(tracking.movingAverageHistory);
00209                   
00210                   // Update times
00211                   tracking.timeRemaining = (file.size - tracking.bytesUploaded) * 8 / tracking.movingAverageSpeed;
00212                   tracking.timeElapsed = (now - tracking.startTime) / 1000;
00213                   
00214                   // Update percent
00215                   tracking.percentUploaded = (tracking.bytesUploaded / file.size * 100);
00216             }
00217             
00218             return tracking;
00219       };
00220       SWFUpload.speed.removeTracking = function (file, trackingList) {
00221             try {
00222                   trackingList[file.id] = null;
00223                   delete trackingList[file.id];
00224             } catch (ex) {
00225             }
00226       };

00228       SWFUpload.speed.formatUnits = function (baseNumber, unitDivisors, unitLabels, singleFractional) {
00229             var i, unit, unitDivisor, unitLabel;
00230 
00231             if (baseNumber === 0) {
00232                   return "0 " + unitLabels[unitLabels.length - 1];
00233             }
00234             
00235             if (singleFractional) {
00236                   unit = baseNumber;
00237                   unitLabel = unitLabels.length >= unitDivisors.length ? unitLabels[unitDivisors.length - 1] : "";
00238                   for (i = 0; i < unitDivisors.length; i++) {
00239                         if (baseNumber >= unitDivisors[i]) {
00240                               unit = (baseNumber / unitDivisors[i]).toFixed(2);
00241                               unitLabel = unitLabels.length >= i ? " " + unitLabels[i] : "";
00242                               break;
00243                         }
00244                   }
00245                   
00246                   return unit + unitLabel;
00247             } else {
00248                   var formattedStrings = [];
00249                   var remainder = baseNumber;
00250                   
00251                   for (i = 0; i < unitDivisors.length; i++) {
00252                         unitDivisor = unitDivisors[i];
00253                         unitLabel = unitLabels.length > i ? " " + unitLabels[i] : "";
00254                         
00255                         unit = remainder / unitDivisor;
00256                         if (i < unitDivisors.length -1) {
00257                               unit = Math.floor(unit);
00258                         } else {
00259                               unit = unit.toFixed(2);
00260                         }
00261                         if (unit > 0) {
00262                               remainder = remainder % unitDivisor;
00263                               
00264                               formattedStrings.push(unit + unitLabel);
00265                         }
00266                   }
00267                   
00268                   return formattedStrings.join(" ");
00269             }
00270       };

00272       SWFUpload.speed.formatBPS = function (baseNumber) {
00273             var bpsUnits = [1073741824, 1048576, 1024, 1], bpsUnitLabels = ["Gbps", "Mbps", "Kbps", "bps"];
00274             return SWFUpload.speed.formatUnits(baseNumber, bpsUnits, bpsUnitLabels, true);
00275       
00276       };
00277       SWFUpload.speed.formatTime = function (baseNumber) {
00278             var timeUnits = [86400, 3600, 60, 1], timeUnitLabels = ["d", "h", "m", "s"];
00279             return SWFUpload.speed.formatUnits(baseNumber, timeUnits, timeUnitLabels, false);
00280       
00281       };
00282       SWFUpload.speed.formatBytes = function (baseNumber) {
00283             var sizeUnits = [1073741824, 1048576, 1024, 1], sizeUnitLabels = ["GB", "MB", "KB", "bytes"];
00284             return SWFUpload.speed.formatUnits(baseNumber, sizeUnits, sizeUnitLabels, true);
00285       
00286       };
00287       SWFUpload.speed.formatPercent = function (baseNumber) {
00288             return baseNumber.toFixed(2) + " %";
00289       };
00290       
00291       SWFUpload.speed.calculateMovingAverage = function (history) {
00292             var vals = [], size, sum = 0.0, mean = 0.0, varianceTemp = 0.0, variance = 0.0, standardDev = 0.0;
00293             var i;
00294             var mSum = 0, mCount = 0;
00295             
00296             size = history.length;
00297             
00298             // Check for sufficient data
00299             if (size >= 8) {
00300                   // Clone the array and Calculate sum of the values 
00301                   for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00302                         vals[i] = history[i];
00303                         sum += vals[i];
00304                   }
00305 
00306                   mean = sum / size;
00307 
00308                   // Calculate variance for the set
00309                   for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00310                         varianceTemp += Math.pow((vals[i] - mean), 2);
00311                   }
00312 
00313                   variance = varianceTemp / size;
00314                   standardDev = Math.sqrt(variance);
00315                   
00316                   //Standardize the Data
00317                   for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00318                         vals[i] = (vals[i] - mean) / standardDev;
00319                   }
00320 
00321                   // Calculate the average excluding outliers
00322                   var deviationRange = 2.0;
00323                   for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00324                         
00325                         if (vals[i] <= deviationRange && vals[i] >= -deviationRange) {
00326                               mCount++;
00327                               mSum += history[i];
00328                         }
00329                   }
00330                   
00331             } else {
00332                   // Calculate the average (not enough data points to remove outliers)
00333                   mCount = size;
00334                   for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00335                         mSum += history[i];
00336                   }
00337             }
00338 
00339             return mSum / mCount;
00340       };
